discription:
Work with latest technologies like Docker, AWS, among many others.
Develop tools and infrastructure to deploy, administer and monitor a large scale Web Based, Internet of Things service.
Develop tools and infrastructure related to test automation, release automation, build and debugging environment.
Find opportunities to automate processes, reducing time to ship new releases.
Control and manage both internal systems as well as AWS cloud resources.
Constantly improve developer experience by doing what it takes.
Introduce, maintain and upgrade software productivity tools to scale its operations.
Work with independence, and ownership of tasks.
Become a life line for operations.
What we are looking for : **

Strong background (minimum 3 years) in devops / system administration with Linux.
End to end knowledge of linux build and release processes.
A breadth of skill including, Python, Perl, Unix shell scripting, MySQL server administration, Web Server deployment.
Ability to query system performance metrics at a blink of eye.
Result oriented approach to work and good communication skills.
Huge Plus if you have : **

Past experience in deploying cloud based web applications.
Experience with embedded/distributed systems.
Experience with hosting services like AWS, Azure, OpenStack.
Work Environment: **

OptumSoft has a flat Organization Structure, is Engineer Driven and has Open Culture.
Flexible work hours, opportunities to work remotely, great workplace facilities with snacks and catered lunch.
Impressive compensation packages with travel opportunities.
Opportunity to work with engineers from top schools and accomplished top industry veterans.

contact_details: Company Description: Teach For India aims to help all children in India receive a high-quality education by engaging a talented group of young leaders to work in the countrys education sector.
discription:
Description 
 Position Summary 
The EdX Specialist is responsible for helping build a collaborative, innovative, and productive community based around the Teacher Training Portal. The Specialist will be responsible for updating website, uploading courses to the portal and providing quality support to partner organization who are using Firki. The portal is focused on transforming teaching and learning, and providing quality education for teachers all across India. 
 
Team Overview 
The Training and Impact Team sets a strong vision of excellence for every staff member, Fellow and student to drive towards, designs tools, resources and learning experiences and empowers them with support and experiences to guide them on their path of leadership. We Research the biggest needs for our program and the best practices available; Design the solutions to meet the needs, Empower program staff, Fellows and students and Learn about the impact of our interventions. Through our work, we impact 40,000 students through the 1100 fellows and 80 program staff across our 7 cities. 
 
Firki 
 
Firki is Indias first and only Online Teacher Training Portal: a world-class, open-source blended learning programme for teachers across India to access, use and transform their teaching practice. It focuses on general pedagogy, is designed for both in-service and pre-service educators, to improve their practice and student outcomes. Firki aims to reach out to 50,000 users through the teacher training portal across India directly impacting 1,96,500 children. 
 
The long term vision for Firki is to be the most accessible and effective route to a high quality alternative certification in India. Firki takes a 70/20/10 approach to teacher training in which 70% of the learning happens through the on the job experience of being a teacher in the classroom, 20% through coaching, mentoring and communities of practice, and 10% through coursework (online portal). 
 
 
Responsibilities 
Responsible for updating website, uploading courses to the portal and providing quality support to partner organization who are using Firki 
Engage with the teacher community to answer questions and provide technical questions 
Identify areas for improvement in our setup and customization process and documentation and implement those improvements 
Contribute to defining the overall strategy for increasing adoption of and contribution to the Firki edX platform, including defining and tracking metrics and setting and achieving goals based on the metrics and strategy 
 
Knowledge and Technical Skills 
Knowledge of and comfort with Python and Javascript 
Familiarity and comfort with Devstack and Vagrant 
Comfort with HTML and CSS if writing front-end features 
Understanding of edX internationalization, or willing to learn 
Knowledge of edX accessibility guidelines, or willing to learn   
Ability to train teams in usage of Technology and deliver a high quality user experience 
 
Competencies and Abilities 
 
Excellent project management, and communication 
Demonstrated excellence in building strong relationships 
Strong critical thinking skills 
Ability to be resourceful, take responsibility and find effective solutions to problems 
 
Values and Mindsets 
Immense sense of possibility 
Belief that Technology can and will change the way people work today and that the organizations can only grow with technology as one of its strong pillars 
A vision to empower an organization to innovate using Technology 
 
Education and Experience 
We believe that reaching our vision demands that we have the best and brightest group of leaders working to lead this country. Here are the minimum qualifications we look for:  
 
MS/MTech/ME/BS/BTech/BE or equivalent  
1-2 years of work experience 
1-2 years of web development experience AND/OR Proficiency in Python 
Community experience [preferred] 
One or more of: 
Active participation in a significant open source community 
Strong record of contribution to open source projects 
Demonstrated success in a developer advocate or other community-facing role.  
 APPLY NOW
